org.apache.cassandra.transport

Class CBUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.transport.CBUtil

  • public abstract class CBUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    ByteBuf utility methods. Note that contrarily to ByteBufferUtil, these method do "read" the ByteBuf advancing it's (read) position. They also write by advancing the write position. Functions are also provided to create ByteBuf while avoiding copies.

    • Field Summary
